layout_structure: The layout features a fixed top header with search and branding, followed by a vertically scrollable content area. This content area is organized into distinct sections, each typically beginning with a header and displaying a horizontal carousel of items. A fixed bottom navigation bar provides primary app navigation.

typography.heading_sizes: Headings vary from medium (e.g., 'New user gift', 'Lightning deals') to large (e.g., 'TEMU' logo).
typography.body_text_size: Body text is generally small to medium, with promotional text like 'Free shipping' appearing slightly larger, and detailed text like 'Ends in' or '3 sold' being quite small.

spacing_and_density.overall_density: Comfortable, with clear separation between major sections. Within carousels and cards, elements are more tightly packed to maximize product visibility.
spacing_and_density.element_spacing: There is moderate vertical spacing between main content sections (e.g., between the review card and 'New user gift' section). Horizontal spacing within product carousels is tight to fit multiple items. Padding around text and within cards is consistent and provides good readability.

accessibility_observations: Some smaller text elements (e.g., countdown timers, 'X sold' labels, original prices) may have low readability for users with visual impairments.
The contrast of the main text and background colors is generally good.
The small size of the countdown timer above the cart icon, including its progress bar, might be difficult to perceive or tap for some users.
notable_patterns: Persistent Header: For search and branding.
Bottom Navigation Bar: Standard for primary app navigation.
Horizontal Carousels: Efficiently displays multiple items within a category or deal section.
Promotional Cards: Highlights deals and offers with clear visual cues.
Countdown Timers: Creates a sense of urgency for limited-time offers.
User Reviews Section: Builds trust and provides social proof.
Price Comparison: Shows original and discounted prices.
Social Proof: Displays 'X sold' under products to encourage purchases.
